name: Night of the Necromancer
description:
It's Halloween night and the dread Necromancer Jeff is up to no good!

He's trying to raise the dead from their graves to be his undead workforce because apparently the dead can't unionize.

Anyway it's something about a package delivery company.  Or maybe a web3 startup.  Or crypto.  Not NFTs though.  He's a Necromancer, not a moron.  

Quickly dig up the bones before the timer runs out but beware, those bewildering bones have been moving around!

Features
  • See how many skeletons you can dig up
  • The clock is ticking and you have less time each time you succeed
  • Randomized body part locations
  • Bad jokes
  • Supports Keyboard or Controller
  • Accessibility: Hold button to autodig option available
